weekly picks (Oct 1 week 2024)

Posted on October 7, 2024 in 2024oct,  Daily t.me,  adsabs,  g scholar

A WordCloud of 2024 Oct 1st week collection

  1. ad6421 Polarity-controllable magnetic skyrmion filter (Chinese Physics B)

  2. rs-4652186/v1 Direct observation of layer skyrmions in twisted WSe2 bilayers (researchsquare)

  3. sym16081066 Stable Majorana Zero-Energy Modes in Two-Dimensional Josephson Junctions (Symmetry)

  4. 257-261 Switching of skyrmion states by uniaxial deformations and stability of skyrmions in elastic ferromagnetic film (Letters on Materials)

  5. s41467-024-52616-8 An atomically controlled insulator-to-metal transition in iridate/manganite heterostructures (Nature Communications)

  6. PhysRevB.110.094442 Fractional topological charges in two-dimensional magnets (PRB)

  7. PhysRevB.110.094440 Dzyaloshinskii-Moriya interaction and nontrivial spin textures in the Janus semiconductor monolayers V X Y (X=Cl, Br , I ; Y=S, Se, Te) (PRB)

  8. 2409.17813 Spin-Dependent Signatures of Majorana Vortex Fusion within Planar Josephson (arXiv)

  9. PhysRevB.110.115156 Effects of Peierls phases in open linear chains (PRB)

  10. 2409.17461 Inertia in skyrmions confined to one-dimensional geometries (arXiv)

  11. PhysRevB.110.115154 Role of the Fermi ring in determining the magic angles in twisted bilayer graphene (PRB)

  12. 2409.16523 Competition between d-wave and d+is-wave superconductivity in the Hubbard model on a checkerboard lattice (arXiv)

  13. pnas.2404009121 Optical conductivity of the Majorana mode at the s- and d-wave topological superconductor edge (PNAS)

  14. 3314197 Skyrmionium creation and annihilation: Experimental and micromagnetic simulation demonstration (APL)

  15. 2409.16649 Exploring the Magnetotransport Signature of antiskyrmions in Mn1.4PtSn (arXiv)

  16. 2409.17761 Excited States Band Mapping and Ultrafast Nonequilibrium Dynamics in Topological Dirac Semimetal 1T-ZrTe2 (arXiv)

  17. PhysRevApplied.22.034055 Spatial modulation strategy for construction of artificial polar skyrmion arrays in ferroelectrics (PRApplied)

  18. PhysRevB.110.115146 Self-consistent theory of fractional quantum anomalous Hall states in rhombohedral graphene (PRB)

  19. 124303/3313769 Inhomogeneous stripe phase and tunable Majorana zero modes in Rashba s-wave superconducting systems in the presence of in-plane Zeeman field (JAP)

  20. 2409.13027 Nonreciprocal Equilibrium 4π-Periodic Josephson Effect from Poor Man’s Majorana Zero Modes (arXiv)

  21. 2409.13078 Catalogue of Phonon Instabilities in Symmetry Group 191 Kagome MT6Z6 Materials (arXiv)

  22. 123902/3313783 Magnetostriction related to skyrmion-lattice formation in chiral magnet FeGe (JAP)

  23. 2409.14843 Creation of independently controllable and long lifetime polar skyrmion textures in ferroelectricmetallic heterostructures (arXiv)

  24. PhysRevB.110.094430 Stability and dynamics of synthetic antiferromagnetic skyrmions in asymmetric multilayers (PRB)
